bio:treatment.discussion: Genera 2, species 3 (1 genus, 2 species in the flora):

references.reference: Britton, E. G. 1895. Contributions to American bryology. IX. A revision of the genus Scouleria with description of one new species. Bull. Torrey Bot. Club 22: 36–43.
Churchill, S. P. 1985b. The systematics and biogeography of Scouleria Hook. (Musci: Scouleriaceae). Lindbergia 11: 59–71.
